statements: SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionTrends
SELECT media_name, consumption_count FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE consumption_count > 100
SELECT media_name, media_type FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionTrends ORDER BY consumption_count DESC
SELECT media_name, CONCAT('Type: ', media_type) AS media_info FROM MediaConsumptionTrends
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE media_type = 'TV' ORDER BY consumption_date DESC, consumption_count ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT media_name, media_type, consumption_count FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE consumption_count > 100 ORDER BY consumption_count DESC
SELECT media_name, consumption_date FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE media_type = 'Music' AND consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY consumption_date ASC
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE media_type = 'Movie' AND consumption_count > 50 ORDER BY media_name ASC, consumption_count DESC
SELECT media_name AS Name, consumption_count AS Count FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE consumption_date = '2022-08-15' ORDER BY Count DESC
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumption WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT media_type, duration_minutes FROM MediaConsumption ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, forecast_date FROM MediaTrends WHERE popularity_score > 0.8;
SELECT SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM MediaConsumption WHERE media_type = 'Movie';
SELECT trend_category, AVG(popularity_score) AS avg_score FROM MediaTrends GROUP BY trend_category ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_type FROM MediaConsumption WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT trend_category, count(*) AS total_trends FROM MediaTrends GROUP BY trend_category;
SELECT trend_name, popularity_score FROM MediaTrends WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01' AND forecast_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_stamp, duration_minutes FROM MediaConsumption WHERE media_type = 'TV Show';
SELECT trend_name, trend_category FROM MediaTrends WHERE popularity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_stamp, hours_consumed FROM MediaConsumptionTrends ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM UserDemographics WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, media_type, duration_minutes FROM HistoricalData WHERE duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_stamp FROM HistoricalData WHERE media_type = 'movie' ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, hours_consumed FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE media_type LIKE '%video%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_stamp, hours_consumed FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionTrends WHERE media_type = 'TV' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM UserDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT user_id, media_type, duration_minutes FROM HistoricalData WHERE media_type = 'Music' AND duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM UserDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionHistory;
SELECT user_id, media_type, hours_watched FROM MediaConsumptionHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM MediaTrends WHERE trend_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM UserDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, predicted_hours FROM PredictedMediaConsumption WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionHistory WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date_watched DESC, hours_watched ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(hours_watched) AS total_hours_watched FROM MediaConsumptionHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_hours_watched > 10
SELECT user_id, media_type, hours_watched FROM MediaConsumptionHistory WHERE date_watched BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC, hours_watched DESC
SELECT u.user_id, u.age, u.gender, m.media_type FROM UserDemographics u JOIN MediaConsumptionHistory m ON u.user_id = m.user_id WHERE u.gender = 'Female' AND m.hours_watched > 3

SELECT p.prediction_id, p.user_id, p.media_type, p.predicted_hours, p.prediction_date, t.trend_description FROM PredictedMediaConsumption p JOIN MediaTrends t ON p.media_type = t.media_type ORDER BY p.prediction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_trends;
SELECT id, media_type, consumption_hours FROM media_consumption_trends ORDER BY consumption_hours DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM media_content WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name FROM media_platforms ORDER BY launch_date;
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_trends WHERE consumption_hours > 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT media_type, SUM(consumption_hours) AS total_hours FROM media_consumption_trends GROUP BY media_type;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT platform_name, launch_date FROM media_platforms ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
SELECT content_id, title, genre FROM media_content WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
